name: Ledge_Leap
description:
Made a 3D for ScoreSpace gamejam.

Made using Unity and Blender.

Jump over the falling ledges to reach the top of self-building sky scrapper, avoid crushing your self under the boulders or falling off the ledge.

Try to reach as much high as possible!!

Controls: W, A, S, D to move the player and "F" to jump
